description:
Dot is a skilled programmer and a member of the Rising Volt Tacklers. Online, she is known as http://anidb.net/ch131111 [Gurumin], a popular streamer that makes videos on various topics of the Pokémon world. She was responsible for the Brave Asagi`s technology system and created the Pokédex system used by members of the Rising Volt Tacklers. Dot received a Quaxly as her starter Pokémon.
Source: Bulbapedia
name: Dot
